content.prompt: The point of view of the artist in the caricature of eighteenth-century French society shown above is that

choices.label: the peasants' misery results from unfair treatment by foreigners
the peasantry is exploited both by the church and by the nobility
the economic welfare of the nation depends upon cooperation among the classes
the clergy, nobility, and peasantry contribute equally to French society
French women of all social classes are exploited by the government

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
